Description.Details: Deadfire Rockets are standard Short Range Missile bodies equipped with an upgraded high explosive payload. In order to make room for this additional payload, severe cuts were taken to the weapons onboard guidance system, all but removing it. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: SRM DeadFire Ammo
